name: Putrid Haunt
description: The Putrid Haunt embodies decay with a decayed appearance, blending into swampy terrain, and appears as a motionless pile of muck and moss when using its False Appearance ability.
memorable: Its ability to ambush by blending in with the swamp and expelling vermin makes it a terrifying encounter.
goals: To inflict harm and spread decay in its environment.
relations: May be found alongside other swamp-dwelling undead or vermin.
environment: Typically found in swamps or marshy areas.
strengths: High Strength score provides powerful melee attacks; immunity to poison is a significant asset.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to attacks and less effective at dodging.
attacks: Uses a Slam melee attack that deals bludgeoning and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Expel Vermin can deal area-of-effect damage and poison multiple targets.
additional_information: Immune to conditions like charm, exhaustion, and poison.
Can navigate swamp terrain without being hindered.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
test_queries: undead creature that uses swamp to ambush
creature that can blend into swamp muck
malicious haunt that expels poisonous vermin
putrid undead creature lurking in the marshes
